VAT.description: This is the unique number that identifies a taxable person (business) or non-taxable legal entity that is registered for VAT, see https://ec.europa.eu/taxation_customs/business/vat/eu-vat-rules-topic/vat-identification-numbers_en

DUNS.description: The Dun & Bradstreet D‑U‑N‑S Number is a unique nine-digit identifier for businesses, https://www.dnb.com/duns-number.html

CageCode.description: The Commercial and Government Entity Code (short CAG), is a unique identifier assigned to suppliers to various government or defense agencies, https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Commercial_and_Government_Entity_code

CertificateLanguages.title: CertificateLanguages
CertificateLanguages.description: For a JSON document one or two translations used in the rendering of HTML and PDF documents can be specificed.

Types.title: Types
Types.description: The types of inspection certificates according EN 10204-2004.

Hash.title: Hash
Hash.description: For any attachment to the JSON document a hash must be calculated and added to the document before adding the base64 encoded data.

Algorithm.description: The algorithm selected to calculate the hash value.

Encoding.description: The format in which the hash value is encoded.

Attachment.title: Attachment
Attachment.description: Additional data in any kind of format attached to JSON document.

Hash.desription: The hash of unencoded data file.

MIME-Type.description: The MIME/Type of the data file.

Encoding.description: The format in which the hash value is encoded.

Data.description: The data encoded as defined in `Encoding`

Person.title: Person
Person.description: A brief description of a natural person.

Role.description: The role of the person in the business process, e.g. 'Quality Manager' or 'Acceptance Office'

Department.description: The department the person is associated with, eg. 'Factory Production Control'

Company.title: Company
Company.description: A company involved in business transaction.

Country.description: The two-letter ISO country code according https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2.

Identifier.description: One or more unique company identifiers.

AdditionalInformation.description: An array of additional free text information on the company.

Parties.title: Parties
Parties.description: The parties and their role in the business transaction.

Manufacturer.description: The party manufacturing the goods and selling them to the customer.

Customer.description: The party buying the goods from the manufacturer.

ConsigneeOfGoods.description: The party receiving the goods for the customer, e.g. freight fowarding agent.

ConsigneeOfCertificate.description: The party receiving the certificates for the customer, e.g. a third party inspection service.

BusinessReferences.title: BusinessReferences
BusinessReferences.description: All information about the underlying commercial transaction such as the order and the delivery.

Order.title: Order
Order.description: Information about the order submiited by the customer to the manufacturer.

Date.description: The date of issuing the order

QuantityUnit.description: The unit of the order quantity

InternalOrderNumber.description: The internal order number issued at the manufacturer.

InternalOrderPosition.description: The position on the internal order issued at the manufacturer.

OrderConfirmation.title: OrderConfirmation
OrderConfirmation.description: Optional information about the order confirmation sent by the manufacturer to the customer.

Number.description: The number of the order confirmation.

Date.description: The date of order confirmation issuance.

Delivery.title: Delivery
Delivery.description: The information from the delivery note.

Number.description: The number of the delivery note.

Date.description: The date of issuing the delivery note.

QuantityUnit.description: The unit of the shipped quantity.

Position.description: The position on the delivery note.

Transport.description: A reference to the transport, e.g. the license plates of trucks or container numbers

GoodsReceiptNumber.description: The number for the goods receipt issued by the Customer or ConsigneeOfGoods

Number.description: The number of the product at the manufacturer.

Name.description: The name of the product as given by the manufacturer, the trade name.

CustomerProductNumber.description: The number for the product issued by the customer.

CountryOfOrigin.description: The two-letter ISO country code of the country in which the product was manufactured.

PlaceOfOrigin.description: The location of the plant in which the product was manufactured.

ChargeNumber.description: The number identifying the batch/lot/charge of production.

ProductionDate.description: The day on which the product was manufactured.

Standards.description: The list of standards to which the product conforms.

AdditionalInformation.description: An array of additional free text information on the product.

Inspection.title: Inspection
Inspection.description: A structure to specify any kind of measurements as defined by https://www.campusplastics.com/campushome/coc

SubProperty.description: A subset of the property measured.

CAMPUSPropertyId.description: https://www.campusplastics.com defines numeric codes for properties used industry-wide

Method.description: The reference to the definition of the method such as EN or ISO norms.

Value.description: A measured or calculated Value (e.g. mean of individual measurements).

Minimum.description: The lower limit according the specification. If not provided it could be 0 or -∞.

Maximum.description: The upper limit according the specification. If not provided it is ∞.

SupplementaryInstructions.description: Further instructions describing the exact procedure of the measurement.

TestConditions.description: A description of the conditions under which the test was executed.

Temperature.description: A field specifically for testing MFR to be provided in degree Celsius

Weight.description: A field specifically for testing MFR to be provided in kg

CE_Image.description: The CE image as base64 encoded png file. A default with size 90x65 is provided by example

NotifiedBodyNumber.description: The identification number of the Notified body. Refer to https://eur-lex.europa.eu/LexUriServ/LexUriServ.do?uri=CELEX:31993L0068:en:HTML and https://ec.europa.eu/growth/tools-databases/nando/index.cfm?fuseaction=notifiedbody.main

DoCYear.description: The year when the declaration of conformance was issued

DoCNumber.description: The declaration of conformance document number

title: Certificate
description: Certificates of Analysis for plastics and other materials.

RefSchemaUrl.description: The URL linking to the JSON schema version the certificate JSON is based on.

Id.description: The certificate identifier, usually a number.

Parties.description: The companies involved in the transaction

Analysis.description: An array with all inspections of the product.

AdditionalInformation.description: An array of additional free text information.

DeclarationOfConformity.description: The statements declaring confirmity and optional CE

Attachments.description: An optional array with data attached to the certificate in encoded form.

Logo.description: The logo of the manufacturer as base64 png file. The maximum size is <TBD>
